short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Gothic medieval fonts in all pages!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wished to surf the web in a medieval gothic atmosphere?
With "Gothic Fonts Everywhere" you can now sense that feeling. This extension replaces all page fonts with a gothic style one.

If you like this extension, please donate me some bucks via Paypal! Very appreciated! (pin extension on toolbar to see donation button)
